logStory.description: Creates a player-facing narrative log entry. Now enforces valid turn/actor, prevents undefined logs, and is used for all story/narrative events including forced escalation and end-of-battle summaries.

logTechnical.description: Creates a technical/developer log entry. Used for analytics and dev, not shown to player. Defensive guards prevent malformed logs.

forcedEscalationHandling.description: When forced escalation occurs and no valid move is possible, a narrator/system log is created. After N consecutive 'no valid move' turns, triggers Sudden Death or forced outcome.

deadlockHandling.description: If the battle ends in a deadlock (e.g., zero total damage), a single, clear narrative log is shown to the player. Technical logs are retained for analytics.

endOfBattleSummary.description: Every battle ends with a clear, player-facing result summary: winner, draw, or deadlock. Epilogue-style narrator lines and call-and-response flavor are added for narrative depth.

narrativePolishRoadmap.description: Replace all 'No valid move possible' logs with immersive, narrator-driven lines. Deduplicate end-state logs. Add epilogue and reflection. Trigger Sudden Death after N 'no valid move' turns. Always end with a clear, player-facing result summary.
